Teamwork Feat: Gains 6 Teamwork feats

Combat
Hit Points: 85 Initiative: +2 Armor Class: 16 Attacks Per Round: 3 Base/Melee/Ranged Attack: +15/+14/+15 Combat Maneuver Bonus/Defense: +14/24
Armor Proficiency: Medium Shield Proficiency: Heavy Weapon Proficiency: Simple
Armor: Breastplate Shield: Buckler Weapons: Battle Aspergillum (+14 d6-1 x2@20); Brass Knuckles (+14 d3-1 x2@20); Longbow (+15 d8-1 x3@20 R100'); Unarmed (+14 d3-1 x2@20)
Combat Notes:
Cunning Initiative: +2 Initiative
Greater Bane: Increased Bane effects
Strength Attack Adjustment: -1
Strength Damage Adjustment: -1
Bane: Gains +2 attack and +4d6 HP damage with chosen weapon vs. specified creature type for 20 rd/dy
Coordinated Defense: +2 CMD (+4 vs. larger foe) when adjacent ally has same feat
Coordinated Maneuvers: +2 CMB, +2 CMD, and +4 vs. grapple when adjacent ally has same feat
Exploit Weakness: Critical hit ignores DR, negates regeneration for 1 rd/+1 HP energy damage/die vs. vulnerable foe
Judgment: May pronounce one of these judgments, gaining specified bonus, 7/dy: destruction (+7 weapon damage), healing (regains +7 HP/rd), justice (+5 attack, dbl to confirm crit), piercing (+7 concentration and caster level to overcome spell resistance), protection (+5 AC, dbl vs. confirm crit), purity (+5 saves, dbl vs. curses, disease, and poison), resiliency (gain DR 5/opposed alignment), resistance (resistance 14 to chosen energy), smiting (weapons count as magic, aligned, adamantine to overcome DR)
Outflank: +4 flanking attack when ally has same feat; crit gives ally AOO
Second Judgment: May use 2 judgments simultaneously
Shield Wall: +1 shield AC bonus when adjacent ally has same feat and buckler or light shield; +2 w/heavy or tower shield
Slayer: Effects of choice of judgment increase to: destruction (+9 weapon damage), healing (regains +9 HP/rd), justice (+6 attack), piercing (+9 concentration and caster level to overcome spell resistance), protection (+6 AC), purity (+6 saves), resiliency (gain DR 6/opposed alignment), resistance (resistance 6 to chosen energy)
Solo Tactics: All allies count for Teamwork feat bonuses
Swap Places: May swap places w/adjacent ally who has same feat; ally suffers no AOO
Third Judgment: May use 3 judgments simultaneously
True Judgment: Successful judgment attack kills foe (DC 22 Fort neg) 1/1d4 rd
Save: Fortitude: +12; Reflex: +6; Will: +14
Save Notes:
Wisdom Will Adjustment: +2
Heart Of The Fields: May ignore fatigued or exhausted effect 1/dy
Stalwart: Successful Fortitude or Will save yields no damage instead of half (heavy armor neg)
Magic
Spell Slots: Inquisitor0: 6; Inquisitor1: 6; Inquisitor2: 6; Inquisitor3: 5; Inquisitor4: 5; Inquisitor5: 5; Inquisitor6: 5 Spell DC: Inquisitor: 12
Magic Notes:
Spell Focus (Evocation): +1 Spell DC (Evocation)
Spell Focus (Illusion): +1 Spell DC (Illusion)
Spell Focus (Transmutation): +1 Spell DC (Transmutation)
Wisdom Inquisitor Spell Slot Bonus: Spell level Inquisitor1, Inquisitor2
Detect Alignment: May cast Detect Chaos, Detect Good, Detect Evil, Detect Law at will
Discern Lies: May use Discern Lies effects 20/dy
Orisons: Knows level-0 spells
Thundering Spell: Target damaged by spell becomes deafened (spell save or Fort neg) for spell level rd; uses +2 spell slot
Notes
Companion Notes: Eye For Talent: Animal companion, bonded mount, cohort, or familiar gains +2 on choice of ability
